author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Reverts PowerShell/PowerShell#5759

This change causes Console test failures in non-windows platforms. The failures are for interactive use with redirected stdin.

closes  #5973

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan Can you please use [feature] tag to trigger the full test run?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: was an issue filed in PSReadline?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: We should help fix that issue if possible so that we can switch to the 2.0.0 PSReadline ASAP.

comments.author: it-praktyk
comments.body:
Do I understand correctly that after resolving the issue: lzybkr/PSReadLine#625 a code introduced by https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/beffdcf94d00b51d9339bb26dbc0e477cd147c92 will be reused?

I'm asking because based on it I started work (as a continuation/replacement of #4618) to pull Pester from PowerShell Gallery too.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: @it-praktyk - I think it's reasonable to assume my approach should be used for other modules like Pester.

title: Revert "Pull PSReadLine from PSGallery"
